LanguageData.VREA_AndroidStandSpot.label: android stand spot
LanguageData.VREA_AndroidStandSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where androids should stand to free up consumed memory space.
LanguageData.VREA_AndroidStand.label: android stand
LanguageData.VREA_AndroidStand.description: A wireless interface that allows an android to rapidly free up consumed memory space. Considerably more efficient than running in sleep mode, as the stand executes the conversion externally.
LanguageData.VREA_AndroidSleepMode.label: android (sleep mode)
